results.title: Sundance Goes Virtual With a More Accessible 2021 Lineup
results.abstract: Among the 72 feature films chosen for the slimmed-down festival are a Tessa Thompson racial-issues drama and a music documentary from Questlove.

results.abstract: The writer-director Christopher Nolan discusses a scene that follows John David Washington and Robert Pattinson’s characters as they’re launched up the side of a tower. The movie is now available on demand.
results.title: Watch the Stars of ‘Tenet’ Leap Tall Buildings
What if the Great American Novelist Doesn’t Write Novels?
results.abstract: Frederick Wiseman’s documentary films offer an unparalleled, panoramic vision of society. His 45th feature, “City Hall,” is on PBS this month — and he’s eager to get back to work.

des_facet: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend a Broken Heart (Movie)
results.abstract: The HBO documentary “The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend a Broken Heart” traces the decades-long arc of a band that mastered a rare pop skill: adaptation.

results.title: New Star of ‘The Prom’ Sees a Chance to Make L.G.B.T.Q. Characters Visible
results.abstract: Like her character, Jo Ellen Pellman identifies as queer, and she is making her film debut in the Netflix musical alongside A-listers like Meryl Streep and Nicole Kidman.

results.title: Same-Sex Kisses Under the Mistletoe: Holiday Movies Rethink a Formula
results.abstract: In a conservative genre that has mainly told straight stories, six new films, including titles on Hallmark and Lifetime, center on gay or lesbian characters.

results.title: WarnerMedia Chief Has Become a Movie Villain to Some in Hollywood
results.abstract: Jason Kilar’s decision to release 2021 movies simultaneously in theaters and on HBO Max has angered many in the industry, including some of the star filmmakers his company relies on.

results.title: Tommy Lister, Actor Who Menaced as Deebo in ‘Friday,’ Is Dead at 62
results.abstract: The actor was found dead in his California home on Thursday after friends and business associates could not reach him, the authorities said.
